name: Infinite supply
body:
### A tacky tagline
"Work on what is important, not just what is interesting. There is an infinite supply of both"

I like oligonucleotides and and want to use them to revolutionize medicine. Like our own DNA and RNA they can be represented as strings of letters (ATCCGCCTGCCG).  This makes them very amenable to bioinformatic _sequence analysis_, which I like to call _oligoinformatics_.


### GitHub Projects
View my github profile @mortenlindow
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
